lacework_instance.description: The fqdn of the FortiCNAPP account

lacework_subaccount.description: The subaccount of the FortiCNAPP instance. Not required

key.description: The  API key for the FortiCNAPP instance

secret.description: The  API secret for the FortiCNAPP instance

marketo_email.description: The email tied to the marketo lead to attach to (optional)

author.description: The name of the author (usually a company name)

email.description: The email to send the report to
